thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Dollar’s Rebound Continues Weighing on Gold

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Dollar’s Rebound Continues Weighing on Gold
text:
Gold on Tuesday extended the previous day’s declines with the dollar climbing for a second- straight session.
Front-month gold for January delivery fell 0.5% to $1,311.70 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange. The precious metal snapped an 11-session winning streak with Monday’s declines but has risen about 6% from its December lows.
A...
